item.title: Parasite Mutant demo for PC now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Play content from the game's first chapter.

IceSitruuna has released a demo for September-announced science-fiction horror RPG Parasite Mutant for PC via Steam, the developer announced.

The demo features the following content:

  • A tutorial to help you learn the core gameplay, including the combat system, etc.
  • The prologue, with a very small amount of story content.
  • An explorable area that covers about five percent of the full gameâ€™s total scope.
  • The demo takes about 45 minutes to complete.

Parasite Mutant is due out for PlayStation 5and PC via Steam in 2026.
